subject: Inquiry Regarding Student Discount / Personalized Offer for Pedal Kit
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I am a racing enthusiast and current Computer Science student looking to
build a reliable and high quality sim racing setup.

As a student on a strict budget, I am currently seeking durable and
reliable pedals, and your products consistently come highly recommended in
the community. I am planning to purchase a used Moza R9 wheel base and
would like to pair it with one of your pedal sets, preferably one that
includes a clutch.

I have noticed that your bundles on platforms like AliExpress are currently
either out of stock or priced higher than I can manage.

Therefore, I am writing to inquire if Simsonn offers any *student discounts*
or if it would be possible to receive a *personalized quote* for a suitable
pedal kit.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Leonhard Herlitz

conversations.body_text: Hi Leonhard Herlitz,       Thank you so much for reaching out — and for considering Simsonn for your first serious sim racing setup! We really appreciate your interest.  To help you out, we’d be happy to offer you a 15% exclusive student discount. Your personal code is: LH15  You can use it directly at checkout on our official website.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=50474715021626  Thanks again for reaching out, and I hope you enjoy building your setup!  Best regards, Simsonn Team

Hello,

Thank you so much for your quick Reply

Do you know if there will be tax on the product as im in Germany or is it
shipped from within Europe?

Best Regards

Leo

service@simsonn.com
Hi Leonhard Herlitz,  You may place your order directly. For orders within the EU, we usually ship from Germany.

Thank you for your reply,

Thats very good to know,
Sadly as life as a student goes my budget shortend this month and my sim
rig has to wait.

I thank you anyways for your kind responses and when the dream comes close
again i will definitely get the pedal set and a wheelbase of you guys if
you offer one then.

Happy holidays

service@simsonn.com
